content: to be dense single_crochet or half_double_crochet along the row one or two row once bag and strap are felted you will thread this strap through the eyelets on the top part of the bag dreads with smaller hook and hc chain for desired length of dread locks 15-20 works well then single_crochet for 1 or 2 row for desired thickness of dread felt by hand assembly felt bag until it is dense and does not have any large holes sew felted dreads into the eyelets around the bottom edge of the top of the bag thread strap through the top eyelet row at the top of the bag needle felt or embroider face onto bag note photos shown are of kintted exes and are for example only page 2/2 design original pattern and sample by gail pasqualotto reverse pattern writer daniella cortez
